summary: Led the design and implementation of cloud platform solutions on AWS, Azure and GCP. Also designed MLOps platform on Azure.
Designed and implemented complete AWS infrastructure transformation, delivering secure networking, optimized storage and performance, robust security, and significant cost savings.
Led a new team of 5+ engineers in automating DevOps pipelines, implementing infrastructure as code, and contributing to the design of scalable and secure cloud networking solutions.
Administered VMware virtual machines, ESXi servers, EMC storage, and Windows servers, while leading infrastructure security patching and compliance efforts.
